argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_predon | |- ( x e. On -> Pred ( _E , On , x ) = x ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( x e. On -> ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) = ( B |` x ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x e. On -> ( G ` ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) ) = ( G ` ( B |` x ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( x e. On -> ( ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) ) <-> ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` x ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ralbiia | |- ( A. x e. On ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) ) <-> A. x e. On ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` x ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_epweon | |- _E We On |
| 8 |  | #P_epse | |- _E Se On |
| 9 |  | #P_tfrALTlem | |- recs ( G ) = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqtri | |- F = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 11 | 7, 8, 10 | #P_wfr3 | |- ( ( B Fn On /\ A. x e. On ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) ) ) -> F = B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( B Fn On /\ A. x e. On ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` Pred ( _E , On , x ) ) ) ) -> B = F ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylan2br | |- ( ( B Fn On /\ A. x e. On ( B ` x ) = ( G ` ( B |` x ) ) ) -> B = F ) |
\
 ~ tfr3 via well-founded recursion.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
